item.title: Trump Reacts to Shooting of MAGA Influencer Charlie Kirk: ‘God Bless Him!’
item.description: President Trump has responded to the shooting of conservative influencer Charlie Kirk on Wednesday, asking supporters to pray for him. Kirk was giving a speech to students at Utah Valley University in
